_header: Christ crowned king that on the cross diedest
_description: The Crowned King, on the Art of Governing — 144 alliterative lines

BodDou95.First Lines:
Crist crowned kyng that on cros didestAnd art comfort of all care
                    þow kyng go out of cours…
BodDou95.Last Lines:
…And of his high grace graunte vnto vs alleProsperite and pees
                    pursue we therafter
BodDou95.Editions:
